text:
In our case we have an installer for our software which bundles the Apache httpd installer and triggers it during installation.
Our installer performs some configuration of Apache after it has been installed.
To avoid unnecessary confusion for the user (the settings done in the apache installer will be overridden anyway) it would be nice to send some configuration parameters to the installer and do the installation silently.

I could not find any information indicating that this is possible today or what is recommended.
creator: alix.warnke@assaabloy.com
